alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 16 at 5:50PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A BROKEN LINE OF SNOW SHOWERS PRODUCING LOW VISIBILITY AND SLICK SPOTS AFFECTING NORTHERN WASHTENAW AND WAYNE COUNTIES DURING THE EVENING COMMUTE... HAZARDS...A line of snow showers reducing visibility to less than 1 mile and to near a quarter of a mile at times will be capable of producing slick spots on area roads and highways, especially on elevated surfaces. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 548 PM EST, the line extended from near Detroit to near Chelsea and moving east at 20 MPH. THE SNOW SHOWERS WILL BE NEAR... Grosse Pointe around 605 PM EST. Dexter around 615 PM EST. Ann Arbor around 635 PM EST. This includes the following highways... I-75 between mile markers 27 and 58. I-275 between mile markers 8 and 29. I-96 between mile markers 168 and 192. M-10 between mile markers 1 and 12. M-14 between mile markers 1 and 21. US-23 between mile markers 26 and 52. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
